content: I don't have access to the artist's intention, but it has been reported that john deacon, the bassist for queen, wrote the bass line specifically for the song and played it on his bass guitar. deacon has credited chic's song "good times" as the inspiration for the bassline in "another one bites the dust". he reportedly wrote the bassline to emulate the sound of a double bass, and the result was a distinctive and memorable part that helped to make the song an instant classic.
